question: 気持ち
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>energy</kanji> you <kanji>hold</kanji> in your body is your <vocabulary>feeling</vocabulary>s. It can take the form of all kinds of things. Good feelings, bad feelings, that "strange feeling."
sourceReadingMnemonic: <ja>気</ja> is on'yomi and you learned that with the kanji. <ja>持ち</ja>, though, is kun'yomi, which you learned with the word <ja>持つ</ja>. One of those weird exception readings, but the <ja>ち</ja> on the end of <ja>持ち</ja> is a clue that it uses the kun'yomi.
